stanza.line: What is your substance whereof are you (a)made(/a)
That millions of strange shadows on you (b)tend(/b)
Since every one hath every one one (a)shade(/a)
And you but one can every shadow (b)lend(/b)
On Helen's cheek all art of beauty (c)set(/c)
And you in Grecian tires are painted (d)new(/d)
Speak of the spring and foison of the (e)year(/e)
The one doth shadow of your beauty (f)show(/f)
The other as your bounty doth (e)appear(/e)
And you in every blessed shape we (f)know(/f)
In all external grace you have some (g)part(/g)
But you like none none you for constant (g)heart(/g)
